lead_paragraph: The unemployment rate rose to 10 percent in February. Consumer prices increased 1.5 percent in March from a year earlier, driven by energy and food costs.
snippet: The unemployment rate rose to 10 percent in February. Consumer prices increased 1.5 percent in March from a year earlier, driven by energy and food costs.

headline.main: Unemployment and Inflation Rise in Europe
